titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 218) to amend title 18, United States Code, to exempt qualified current and former law enforcement officers from State laws prohibiting the carrying of concealed handguns.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Cunningham. Petition No: 107-4.

bill.summary: 10/30/2001--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 218 (exemption of law enforcement officers from State concealed handgun prohibitions).
